titleStmt.title: The magistrates pourtraiture drawn from the Word, and preached in a sermon at Stowe-Market in Suffolk, upon August, the 20. 1656. before the election of Parliament-men for the same county. / By William Gurnall, M.A. of Eman. Coll. now pastor of the Church of Christ in Lavenham. Suffolk.
titleStmt.author: Gurnall, William, 1617-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bible in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.
